name: sap-btp-intelligent-situation-automation
description: This skill provides comprehensive guidance for SAP BTP Intelligent Situation Automation setup, configuration, and operations. It should be used when implementing situation-based automation between SAP S/4HANA systems and SAP Business Technology Platform. The skill covers subscription setup, Event Mesh integration, destination configuration, system onboarding, user management with role collections, automatic situation resolution, and troubleshooting.
